Package application_frames

Contains the frames used to make up the interface of the entire application, including the main application frame, the Settings window, the Attribute Table window and other associated GUI frames.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeTableFrame
    Shows attribute table of all Features in a Layer

    It is realized with a JTable.
    DatabaseCatalog
    Displays the connected databases, tables and the layers.
    Layers can also be added to the drawing panel directly and can be deleted from the database as well.
    FilesFrame
    Frame for opening and saving drawing sessions.

    Has two major buttons, open and save which can be accessed and an action listener can be attached to it where it is needed.
    The frame is not resizable and it is never closed when the close button is pressed, but hidden, it is available throughout the drawing session once it has been initialized.
    ImportExportFrame
    Frame for importing and exporting files such as csv files and geojson
    MainFrame
    Main frame of the application.
    At the initial start of the application, the settings frame is first displayed to set the database connection and general drawing settings.
    SettingsFrame
    Class contains the general settings for the application
    In this class the general settings of the application are defined.

Package application_frames Description

Contains the frames used to make up the interface of the entire application, including the main application frame, the Settings window, the Attribute Table window and other associated GUI frames.
